Bakersfield.Oil City, California:
Oil City is an unincorporated community in Kern County, California, about 5 miles (8 km) northeast of Bakersfield, adjacent to the Kern River Oil Field.
Another "Oil City" is located in Fresno County within the Coalinga Oil Field, about 9 miles (14 km) north of Coalinga, at an elevation of 449 feet (137 m).
The town was named for Oil City, Pennsylvania.
